text: Twentieth Century is a 1934 American romantic comedy movie directed by Howard Hawks and starring John Barrymore, Carole Lombard, Walter Connolly, Roscoe Karns, Charles Lane, Etienne Girardot, Edgar Kennedy. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. The film was added to the National Film Registry of the Library of Congress in 2011. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1934 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies about actors Category:Movies about theatre Category:Movies set in Chicago
title: Twentieth Century (movie)
